name: Seaside Smasher
description:
Jealous of the other kids impressive sandcastles, you decide to... SMASH THEM!

Fling yourself around by touching the character, pull back from the target and then release.

Don't eat too much ice cream - you'll end up feeling sick - then it's game over.

Avoid high velocity beach balls and runaway donkeys.

Some images were found on openclipart.org (and tweaked). Some sound fx came from freesound.org

There are 2 alternative methods of installing/running the game.

1.) Download and install the Android apk file.

or

2.) Download Pocket Code from Google Play, then via the Explore menu in Pocket Code download the original Pocket Code files from here.
